title: The Moon
subtle: Informational (nonfiction), 54 words, Level C (Grade K), Lexile 120L
description: Have you ever wondered why the Moon looks a little different each night? The Moon provides students with a look at the cycle of the Moon as it changes over time. The high-frequency words, repetitive sentence structure, and vivid photographs are perfect for early emergent readers. The book can also be used to teach students how to sequence events and use complete sentences.
meta: changes, cycle, dark, different, full, thin
Initial Consonants : Discriminate initial consonant /t/ sound
Complete Sentences : Recognize and use complete sentences
High-Frequency Words : Identify and use the high-frequency wordsagain, is, look

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
